# [Ethical Fashion Dashboard](https://github.com/aspenjack/Ethical-Fashion/blob/main/Ethical-Fashion_v1.ipynb)

<p style="font-size: 25px; text-align:center">Interactive dashboard exploring sustainability and fair wage practices of various fashion companies and their headquarters</p>
-------------------------------- 
Contains visualizations of 5 key metrics related to sustainability and fair wage practices. End-to-end process included **sourcing data** from [Fashion Revolution](https://www.fashionrevolution.org/about/transparency/), **cleaning and formatting** in Python, **loading into PostgreSQL** via SQLAlchemy, **creating a Flask App** to link PostgreSQL database, **constructing a website** using JavaScript, Bootstrap, and HTML, and **creating visualizations** using D3, Plotly, and Leaflet.
